scripts.deploy:contracts: cd packages/zkp && forge script script/Deploy.s.sol --fork-url http://127.0.0.1:8545 --private-key 0xac0974bec39a17e36ba4a6b4d238ff944bacb478cbed5efcae784d7bf4f2ff80 --broadcast && forge script script/BatchRegister.s.sol --fork-url http://127.0.0.1:8545 --private-key 0xac0974bec39a17e36ba4a6b4d238ff944bacb478cbed5efcae784d7bf4f2ff80 --broadcast && forge script script/SubmitProposal.s.sol --fork-url http://127.0.0.1:8545 --private-key 0xac0974bec39a17e36ba4a6b4d238ff944bacb478cbed5efcae784d7bf4f2ff80 --broadcast
scripts.deploy: pnpm run build && pnpm run start
scripts.build: pnpm run build:server && pnpm run build:client
